title: LeaverBuster is flawed - UNACCEPTABLE
body:
Yesterday, I queued into a game and began playing. Some minutes into the game I got the message "Attempting to reconnect". My Wifi disconnected, and reconnected within a matter of seconds. I tested the connection by logging into TeamSpeak, streaming videos, loading other games, and my internet was perfect. However, inside my League game, I still was receiving the message "Attempting to reconnect".

I did not want to be LeaverBusted, so I let the client sit there hoping it would reconnect. An hour passes. I'm now frustrated and exit the game seeing as how I'd made no progress and am stuck in an infinite loop of "Attempting to recconect" . The second I exited the game, I was brought to the post-game lobby, not a screen telling me to reconnect to my game. That's because the game had been over for the last 20 minutes of me waiting. I read all the post game chat, saw all the stats for the game, but was told I had been LeaverBusted. But I "left" 20 mins after the game ended. Broken. This is unacceptable and broken. I don't know how something like this makes it into a stable build of a software release. I bet I'm not the only person this has happened to.

TLDR; I was LeaverBusted for leaving a game that was over. So I literally didn't leave any game at all. LeaverBuster is flawed. The issue may stem further down into the client itself's connection protocol.

Thanks,

Kepler

replies.body:
Being punished for leaving a single game is definitely unacceptable.  We understand that things happen that are seemingly beyond your control, and do not want you punished for that.  However, you were not punished for leaving a single game.  Within the past 30 days, there has been 3 games where you have also AFK'd/DC'd from.  Given that the system is not recognizing a pattern of games being left, this is why it issued penalties.

If there are consistent tech issues causing these leaves, make sure to reply back and let me know.  I should be able to work with you to get this resolved so you don't have to face any future penalties!

hello sir i was hoping you could help me. i was about to start and game and such and when it started loading my game crashed for no reason (this has been a thing with other people im sure) and it would not let me reconnect to the game. to fix this i had to restart my pc and well it all worked and i got it. however i got a Leaver buster due to this crash (as well as lost my game). im sure this is not really on my end and more of lol itself, ive been playing for a we bit and this has only happened as of late. this has happened to me i think 2-3 times now in the past week or two. over all point is that i crash due to (what i feel as ) a bug or something and i got an LB because of it. is there anyway this can be fixed or my LB removed? or even that game lost to not count to my lp at all? i know you will most likely say no but it was worth a try
